overdose.translation[0].definitions[0].d: too much of a drug taken at one time
overdose.translation[0].definitions[0].e: She took an overdose and died two days later.
overdose.translation[0].definitions[1].d: too much of something, especially something harmful
overdose.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to take too much of a drug at one time, so that it harms you or kills you
